comments:
There is a prblem in the UML2 code generator when the "Minimal Reflective Methods" generator model property is set to true.

Calling Diagnostician.INSTANCE.validate() and giving it a model element thorws a StackOverflowError like this:

java.lang.StackOverflowError
 at 
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.impl.BasicEObjectImpl.eIsSet(BasicEObjectImpl.java:794)
 at Logic.impl.LogicElementImpl.eIsSet(LogicElementImpl.java:189)

 at

 at Logic.impl.LogicElementImpl.eIsSet(LogicElementImpl.java:189)
 at

 at

 at

The fix has been committed to CVS.
The fix is available in the 2.0RC5 build.
